briefTitle: Exploratory Study of Advanced Breast Cancer in HER2 Positive Patients With Failure of Multi-line Therapy Treated by Combination of Inetetamab (Cipterbin) + PD-1 Inhibitor Combined With Utidelone.
officialTitle: Exploratory Study of Advanced Breast Cancer in HER2 Positive Patients With Failure of Multi-line Therapy Treated by Combination of Inetetamab (Cipterbin) + PD-1 Inhibitor Combined With Utidelone.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: progression-free survival rate at 3 months（PFS rate）
